labels.drag-note: Drag and drop your files here
labels.name: Name

quote-requests-delete.title: Confirm delete
quote-requests-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected quote request(s)?

quote-delete.title: Confirm delete
quote-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this quote?

quote-save.title: Save changes
quote-save.message: The quote has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

quote-cancel.title: Cancel quote
quote-cancel.message: Are you sure you want to cancel this quote?

proposal-submit.title: Confirm proposal
proposal-submit.message: Once you have submitted your proposal, certain parts of your quote will be locked and cannot be modified. Are you sure you want to proceed?

proposal-submit-with-warning.title: Incomplete quote proposal
proposal-submit-with-warning.message: Warning: Offer is missing or totals zero. Please ensure that all items are listed and priced correctly before proceeding. Are you sure you want to proceed?

hold-confirmation.title: Confirm put on hold
hold-confirmation.message-release: Are you sure you want to reactivate this quote?
hold-confirmation.message-place: Are you sure you want to put this quote on hold?

DefaultStatus.title: Default quote status
DefaultStatus.description: This status will be assigned to the quote created from the shopping cart

QuoteRequestNewNumberTemplate.title: RFQ number template
QuoteRequestNewNumberTemplate.description: This template or pattern will be used to generate numbers for new quote requests. 0 is the date and time (UTC) when the number was generated, while 1 is the sequence number

EnableQuotes.title: Enable quotes
EnableQuotes.description: Enable the switch to activate quotes in the store

FileUploadScopeName.title: File upload scope name
FileUploadScopeName.description: Specify the scope name for file upload configurations and policies. Default: quote-attachments

file-upload-error.invalid-configuration: File upload scope is not configured
file-upload-error.duplicate-name: File with the same name already exists
file-upload-error.INVALID_EXTENSION: File type is not one of the allowed types ({{parameter}})
